git:package.description: Generates a Metadata Package using the differences between two git refs (branch or commit)

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

sourceref.name: sourceref
sourceref.description: The git ref (branch or commit) which we are deploying from. If left blank, will use head

targetref.name: targetref
targetref.description: The git ref (branch or commit) which we are deploying into. Defaults to master

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: The directory to output the generated package and metadata to

ignorewhitespace.name: ignorewhitespace
ignorewhitespace.description: Don't package changes that are whitespace only

purge.name: purge
purge.description: Delete output dir if it already exists (without prompt)

force.name: force
force.description: Continue even if source is behind target
